sentences.en: Clang, clang goes the woodman's axe.
He could hear the clang of distant bells.
sentences.cn: 他能够听到远处叮当的钟声.

sentences.en: He pulled the gates to with a clang.
sentences.cn: 他把大门咣当一声带上了。

sentences.en: I have never forgotten that number, and always it comes to memory attended by gibbering obscenity, peals of joyless laughter, the clang of iron doors.
sentences.cn: 我一直没有忘记那个号码，它总会出现在记忆中，伴随它的有混乱的肮脏事情，有欢声笑语，也有铁门的叮当声。

sentences.en: In the older part of the city, the clang and bang of the builders goes on all day.
sentences.cn: 在老城区，建筑工人的咣咣当当声每天不绝于耳。

sentences.en: It gave a metallic clang, like a cracked bell.
sentences.cn: 它发出了金属碰击般的哐啷声，跟破钟似的。

sentences.en: Naked feet swished dryly across the planks in the wooden floor and the clang ceased abruptly.
sentences.cn: 光着的脚丫子啪哒啪哒踩着木头地板走过来,闹钟立刻不响了.

sentences.en: She thrilled at the shrill clang of the ambulance bell.
sentences.cn: 她听到救护车刺耳的当当声总是感到紧张.

sentences.en: She thrills at the shrill clang of the ambulance bell.
sentences.cn: 她听到救护车刺耳的当当场院总是感到紧张.

sentences.en: The clang of the fire bell aroused the town.
sentences.cn: 报火警钟的当当声惊醒了全镇.

sentences.en: The clang of the firebell alarmed the village.
sentences.cn: 火警铃的叮当声惊动了全村的人.

sentences.en: The iron gate was pulled to with a clang.
The iron gates of the park shut with a jangling clang.
sentences.cn: 公园的铁门当啷一声关上.

sentences.en: There was a clang as he dropped the tools.
sentences.cn: 他扔掉工具时有铿锵的撞击声.

sentences.en: This past April the ISS crew reported hearing a similar clang.
sentences.cn: 今年4月,太空站人员也报告听到类似的金属撞击声.

sentences.en: With a puff, a clang, and a clatter of rails it was gone.
sentences.cn: 火车喷发出一股浓烟, 切嚓切嚓, 铁轨发出一声撞击声,那小河就被抛在后面了.

trans.tran_en: if a metal object clangs, or if you clang it, it makes a loud ringing sound
